meanings: (조직·단체 등으로의) [동사] be included, be incorporated; (군대에) be assigned
be placed on the reserve list
be assigned to the armed reserves

vlive.korean: 편입을 왜 해, 이런 데로 - 퇴학당했구나? Why transfer to here? - Did you get kicked out? 듣기 View video OSEN : iKON 아이콘 'Star Road' EP.01
vlive.english: Why transfer to here? - Did you get kicked out?

vlive.korean: 편입을 왜 해, 이런 데로 - 퇴학 당했구나? Why transfer to somewhere like this? - You were expelled, weren't you? 듣기 View video OSEN : iKON 아이콘 'Star Road' 하이라이트 05. 송윤형
vlive.english: Why transfer to somewhere like this? - You were expelled, weren't you?

vlive.korean: '저는 2년제를 졸업후 3학년으로 편입을 준비 중인 23살 이혜정이라고 합니다.' "I am Lee Hyejung who graduated a 2 year school and getting ready to transfer as a junior." 듣기 View video INFINITE : 우현이 내게 오나봐 잘사람자라디오 12화
vlive.english: "I am Lee Hyejung who graduated a 2 year school and getting ready to transfer as a junior."

vlive.korean: 저희 친형도 편입하거든요. My brother is going to transfer. 듣기 View video B.A.P : [REPLAY] B.A.P NOIR PREMIERE (가제: 팝콘 머글 시간도 엄서용)
vlive.english: My brother is going to transfer.

vlive.korean: 맞아, 부사관학과 편입생이야. Yes, he transferred from a school in Busan. 듣기 View video 웹드라마 더블루씨(the BlueSea) : 더블루씨(the BlueSea) 1화 - 우연한 만남
vlive.english: Yes, he transferred from a school in Busan.

examples.korean: Vegetarianism has been mainstreamed. 발음듣기 채식주의가 주류에 편입되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
I’m thinking about transferring to another university. 발음듣기 다른 대학교로 편입하려고 생각 중이야. DARAKWON
examples.english: I’m thinking about transferring to another university. 발음

examples.korean: We said we could incorporate all of their requests, but it would mean pushing the opening back by a few weeks. 발음듣기 우리는 그들의 요구를 모두 편입시킬 수 있지만 홈페이지의 오픈을 몇 주 정도 늦추게 될 것이라고 말했습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We said we could incorporate all of their requests, but it would mean pushing the opening back by a few weeks. 발음

examples.korean: China A Share was included in GIMI in 2018. 발음듣기 중국 A 주식은 2018년에 글로벌 인베스터블 마켓 지수에 편입되었다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: China A Share was included in GIMI in 2018. 발음

examples.korean: It's very difficult for immigrants to assimilate into the mainstream society. 발음듣기 이민자가 그 나라의 주류 사회로 편입하는 것은 매우 어렵다 Neungyule
examples.english: It's very difficult for immigrants to assimilate into the mainstream society. 발음
